front.title: Session Peering Use Case for Cable

abstract.t: This document describes a typical use case of session peering in cable industry. Caller Alice makes a VoIP call to Callee Bob. Alice and Bob are served by two different cable operators, mso-o and mso-t. mso-o and mso-t have bi-lateral peering agreement to peer at SIP layer. This document focuses on the SIP layer interactions and discuss some common practices for Layer 5 Peering in cable industry.
